Source.Name: libmpack
Source.Summary: libmpack-lua - Implementation of MessagePack for Lua 5.1 and Lua 5.3
Source.Description: libmpack is a small binary serialization/RPC library that implements both the msgpack and msgpack-rpc specifications.

Package.Name: libmpack
Package.Summary: libmpack-lua - Implementation of MessagePack for Lua 5.1 and Lua 5.3
Package.Description: libmpack is a small binary serialization/RPC library that implements both the msgpack and msgpack-rpc specifications.
